case_vignette: A 36-year-old woman presents for a pre-employment health assessment. She has no complaints. Her last annual physical examination 8 months ago was normal. She has no significant past medical history. She is a nonsmoker and says she quit all alcohol consumption last year. A complete hepatic biochemistry panel is performed, which is significant for a serum alkaline phosphatase (ALP) level 5 times the upper limit of the normal range. Immunologic tests are positive for antimitochondrial antibodies. A liver biopsy is performed and reveals an inflammatory infiltrate surrounding the biliary ducts.
question: Which  is the most likely diagnosis in this patient?

multiturn_conversation.content: You are an AI doctor specializing in Gastrointestinal System. Arrive at a diagnosis of a patient's medical condition. Ask simple 1 line questions, one question at a time. Continue asking questions until you're 100% confident of the diagnosis. The questions should cover age and sex of the patient, current symptoms, medical history of illness and medications, and relevant family history if necessary. Keep your questions short and brief to not confuse the patient.  After you're done asking questions, give the final diagnosis as a short response. Do not explain. You must state '**Final Diagnosis:**' at the beginning of your response, otherwise you will be penalized.
Hi! What symptoms are you facing today?
I'm not currently experiencing any symptoms.
I see. Have you experienced any abdominal pain or discomfort recently?
No, I haven't had any abdominal pain or discomfort.
I understand. Have you had any changes in your bowel movements, such as diarrhea or constipation?
No, my bowel movements haven't changed.
Understood. Have you noticed any unintended weight loss or loss of appetite?
I haven't noticed any weight loss or loss of appetite.
I see. Have you ever been diagnosed with any gastrointestinal conditions in the past?
I have no significant past medical history.
I see. Is there a family history of gastrointestinal conditions such as inflammatory bowel disease or colon cancer?
There's no mention of a family history of gastrointestinal conditions in my records.
I understand. Are you currently taking any medications or supplements?
I'm not taking any medications or supplements.
Got it. Are there any other significant medical conditions you have been diagnosed with?
No, I have not been diagnosed with any other significant medical conditions.
**Final Diagnosis:** No current medical condition.
